description.narrative: To support ANDES (Asociacion para la Naturaleza y el Desarollo Sostenible - Association for Nature and Sustainable Development) in a number of projects and initiatives. ANDES will bring together all regional governments who have passed non-GMO restrictions to push the national government to adopt similar ordinances and challenge the Presidential decree that has allowed GMOs in Peru; protect the human genetic integrity of the Q'ero nation (an isolated Quechua community) who is soon to be subject to genetic sampling; develop the Vilcanota Spiritual Park with leaders of the Q'ero and Vilcanota communities, which will protect the culturally and religiously important Mt. Ausangate that contains immense amounts of biodiversity and glacial coverage; and develop a participatory regional ordinance on Food Sovereignty in the Cusco region that will support indigenous cultural and farming traditions along with promoting native food crops
